java/liquibase/change/AddNotNullConstraintChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.ReorganizeTableStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.SetNullableStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00008 import liquibase.database.sql.UpdateStatement;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00011 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00012 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00014 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00015 
00016 import java.util.*;
00017 
00021 public class AddNotNullConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String tableName;
00024     private String columnName;
00025     private String defaultNullValue;
00026     private String columnDataType;
00027 
00028 
00029     public AddNotNullConstraintChange() {
00030         super("addNotNullConstraint", "Add Not-Null Constraint");
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getSchemaName() {
00034         return schemaName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00038         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public String getTableName() {
00042         return tableName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00046         this.tableName = tableName;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getColumnName() {
00050         return columnName;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public void setColumnName(String columnName) {
00054         this.columnName = columnName;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public String getDefaultNullValue() {
00058         return defaultNullValue;
00059     }
00060 
00061     public void setDefaultNullValue(String defaultNullValue) {
00062         this.defaultNullValue = defaultNullValue;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public String getColumnDataType() {
00066         return columnDataType;
00067     }
00068 
00069     public void setColumnDataType(String columnDataType) {
00070         this.columnDataType = columnDataType;
00071     }
00072 
00073 
00074     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00075         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00076 
00077         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00078         if (defaultNullValue != null) {
00079             statements.add(new UpdateStatement(schemaName, getTableName())
00080                     .addNewColumnValue(getColumnName(), getDefaultNullValue())
00081                     .setWhereClause(getColumnName() + " IS NULL"));
00082         }
00083 
00084         statements.add(new SetNullableStatement(schemaName, getTableName(), getColumnName(), getColumnDataType(), false));
00085 
00086         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00087             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName()));
00088         }
00089 
00090         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00091 
00092     }
00093 
00094     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00095         DropNotNullConstraintChange inverse = new DropNotNullConstraintChange();
00096         inverse.setColumnName(getColumnName());
00097         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00098         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00099         inverse.setColumnDataType(getColumnDataType());
00100 
00101         return new Change[]{
00102                 inverse
00103         };
00104     }
00105 
00106     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00107         return "Null constraint has been added to " + getTableName() + "." + getColumnName();
00108     }
00109 
00110 
00111     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00112         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("addNotNullConstraint");
00113         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00114             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00115         }
00116 
00117         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00118         element.setAttribute("columnName", getColumnName());
00119         element.setAttribute("defaultNullValue", getDefaultNullValue());
00120         return element;
00121     }
00122 
00123     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00124 
00125         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00126 
00127         Column column = new Column();
00128         column.setTable(table);
00129         column.setName(getColumnName());
00130 
00131 
00132         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, column));
00133 
00134     }
00135 }
